references.paper_title: Efficient nonlinear transforms for lossy image compression
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the lightweight encoder design in COSMIC, providing efficient nonlinear transforms for image compression.

references.paper_title: Variational image compression with a scale hyperprior
references.reason: This work is highly relevant to COSMIC's compression module, introducing a key hyperprior model for improved image compression performance.
This paper is important because it provides a baseline method for comparison and is one of the state-of-the-art generative image compression methods that COSMIC outperforms.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work is crucial to COSMIC's compensation module, introducing the use of latent diffusion models for compensating image details and improving reconstruction quality.
This paper is another important baseline method for comparison, illustrating a content-oriented learned image compression approach which COSMIC surpasses.
